
fit = a+sqrt (b+c*n)

n=7..2000    fit  4.0629348  -50.110867   12.888158
n=207..2000  fit  5.0080376  -128.24372   12.763254

n=607..2000  fit  5.3049226  -161.85623   12.731475
n=807..2000  fit  5.2612912  -156.06984    12.73558 
n=1007..2000 fit  3.9397646   21.992659   12.859453 
n=1207..2000 fit  4.0300171   20.260836   12.844738 


fit = a+pow (b+c*n, d)

n=7..2000  fit 2.4170604  -23.930498   15.142444  0.49305719


fit = a + sqrt (4+b*n)

n=7..2000    fit  3.1745257  13.024614
n=207..2000  fit  3.6231585  12.9319
n=407..2000  fit  3.7992513  12.897429

fit = a + b*sqrt (1+n)

n=7..2000    fit 3.0321185 3.6119588
n=207..2000  fit 3.5310735 3.597652
n=407..2000  fit 3.7190974 3.5925337
